data.title: EastEnders Actress Brooke Kinsella Marries In Magical Winter Wedding
data.meta_description: Former EastEnders star Brooke Kinsella has said 'I do' following a magical winter wedding on Thursday. Read on to find out more.
data.text:
Former EastEnders star Brooke Kinsella has said 'I do' following a magical winter wedding on Thursday.

The actress, 34, married her 'best friend' Simon Boardley in a cosy ceremony surrounded by friends and family.

Brooke was introduced to Simon by their mutual friend, ITV’s Judge Rinder, who set the pair up on a blind date.

The pair quickly fell in love and announced their engagement in July of this year.

Brooke's stunning dress was revealed in a picture posted online by her manager Jonathan Shalit.

The photo showed Brooke posing with wedding guests wearing a white fit and flare lace dress with a sweetheart neckline and embellished waistline.

Brooke's happily ever after comes after a family tragedy that saw her 16-year-old step-brother stabbed to death in 2008.

Brooke became an avid campaigner against knife crime following his death and has even received an MBE by Prince Charles for her services to knife crime prevention.

The actress, who is best known for playing Kelly Taylor in the BBC 1 soap, paid tribute to her brother on Instagram just hours before walking up the aisle.

Posting a picture on Instagram of the stunning gardens which surrounded the wedding location, Brooke wrote: 'There was never any doubt my little angel would bring the sun out for me today.'

Another image posted on Instagram showed the actress beaming as she walked back up the aisle with her new husband along with the caption 'Nailed it.'
